name: Laser Rocket
description:
Destroy enemies and asteroids while moving around with a rocket that has a massive laser. Everything can interact with everything, laser, bullets, enemies, asteroids... 

Made for the Lux Jam ll. The theme was "Hack the Planet" and you have to fight your way to the final planet to destroy it. "Hack it"

Made in about 6 total hours by me, djmick254 with help from my friend. All art, code and sounds were made by me during the time limit except for the free font, and the music was composed by me friend. 

Art made in Piskel, Game made in Godot, Sounds made in Bfxr, music made in BeepBox.
